alert.note: Alert for Northern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 23 at 2:06PM EDT until March 24 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM EDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of one to two tenths of an inch at higher elevations. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northern Oneida county. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 11 AM EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Exposed surfaces such as bridges, and higher elevations of Northeastern Oneida County, will be more vulnerable to ice accretion.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible spotty power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
